page.title: 11BUS SERVICES
page.content: Shipdham is a rural village with few local bus services. At present only 7 services pass through daily. Over the last 10 years many services have been withdrawn. In Shipdham a local coach service has replaced some of these journeys. Every school day the coach service collects young children from the outlying villages and delivers them to Shipdham School. Older village children are taken to High School in the nearby town. The coach company,Rudlings, also provides 6 services every Friday to the local market in East Dereham. These services are vital for residents of the village who do not have their own transport.
